amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to provide for a balanced budget by fiscal year 2001; reduce defense spending and corporate tax considerations; delay tax cuts until the budget is balanced; and increase funding for education, training, healthcare, community development, crime prevention, and other discretionary programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to balance the budget by fiscal year 2001 by reducing spending for defense by approximately $190 billion, increasing revenues by $195 billion over 5 years, and delaying further tax cuts until the budget is balanced.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Ms. Waters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 72 - 358, 1 Present (Roll no. 143).
